issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Building Hadoop with -Pdist -Dtar generates the following errors. These don't stop the build from succeeding though.

{code}
ERROR: hadoop-azure has missing dependencies: jetty-util-ajax-9.3.19.v20170502.jar
ERROR: hadoop-resourceestimator has missing dependencies: hadoop-yarn-common-3.2.0-SNAPSHOT.jar

ERROR: hadoop-resourceestimator has missing dependencies: okio-1.6.0.jar
